response.overview: Can you keep your sanity to watch this unprecedented horror until the end?  Short stories of 3 to 10 minutes in length, full of highlights! The innovative plot with a punchline at the end is not only scary but also highly entertaining!  Masato, lost while climbing a mountain, finds a tent in the forest. Inside is a notebook with the eerie words ""He's coming"" written on it. This collection contains eight horror stories, including ""The Black Man,"" which depicts a terrifying night in the wilderness.
response.title: Warning : NSFW Scary Stories 2
